DistanceSensorModel Class Reference
Inheritance diagram for DistanceSensorModel:

Public Member Functions

 DistanceSensorModel (Eigen::Vector3f sensor_offset, pros::Distance distance)
 
void update () override
 Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (~10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame.
 
std::optional< double > p (const Eigen::Vector3f &X) override
 Determine p(z_k, x_k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z_k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x_k).
 

Member Function Documentation

◆ p()

std::optional< double > DistanceSensorModel::p ( const Eigen::Vector3f & x)
inlineoverridevirtual

Determine p(z_k, x_k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z_k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x_k).

Parameters
xThe current particle's position
Returns
Result of p(z_k, x_k)

Implements SensorModel.

◆ update()

void DistanceSensorModel::update ( )
inlineoverridevirtual

Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (~10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame.

Implements SensorModel.
